attributes.action: Give UK supervised pubs near normal trading hours.
attributes.additional_details: U K pubs are the best in the world as is our vibrant nightlife, 9.30 pm last orders and evacuate the pub for 10 pm is not viable . I and my fellow licensees are  incurring huge losses which are unsustainable . We need to return to near normal opening ours during Coved . 9.30 pm will be the death knell for pubs and hotel s. Our industry is on the verge of LAST ORDERS   !
attributes.background: Unless its a national emergency we petition parliament to give 48 hours weekend notice of lockdown. Also 9.30 pm last orders is not viable.
